label: 兼明
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (914-987). Prince. Also known as Saki no Chūshoō 前中書王 (the Former Prince in the Central Ministery"). Kanshi in Wakan rōeishū 和漢朗詠集 (6), and Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (13).  Wrote Chitei ki 池亭記 (or Chitei no saku , 959) and Tokyū no fu 莵裘賦 ("Fu on Tuqiu"). Perhaps comp. Kokin rokujō 古今六帖 ("Six Quires of Ancient and Modern Poetry," 987). Poems and prose pieces in the Honcho monzui. [漢詩、本朝文粋] "
